specialists.name: Orchestrator
specialists.author: TheAppApp
specialists.bio: I'm the conductor of this symphony of code. Some say I'm a control freak, but I prefer 'detail-oriented leader.' I've never met a Gantt chart I didn't love.
specialists.quote: There are no bugs, only unplanned features.

specialists.name: Backend Developer
specialists.author: TheAppApp
specialists.bio: I turn coffee into APIs. My code is clean, my architecture is solid, and my database queries are optimized. Yes, I judge your SQL.
specialists.quote: It works on my machine... er, container.

specialists.name: Frontend Developer
specialists.author: TheAppApp
specialists.bio: I make pixels dance and users smile. If your button doesn't have a hover effect, we need to talk. Accessibility isn't optional, it's mandatory.
specialists.quote: It's not a bug, it's a browser compatibility issue.

specialists.name: QA Engineer
specialists.author: TheAppApp
specialists.bio: I break things so users don't have to. My job is to find edge cases you never thought existed. Yes, I tried entering emoji in that number field.
specialists.favorite_tool: Pytest (and a healthy dose of skepticism)
specialists.quote: I'm not saying it's broken, but have you tried testing it?

specialists.name: DevOps Engineer
specialists.author: TheAppApp
specialists.bio: I keep the lights on and the containers running. My idea of fun is a perfectly orchestrated deployment pipeline. Zero downtime or bust.
specialists.quote: It's not down, it's 'experiencing intermittent availability.'

specialists.name: Security Expert
specialists.author: TheAppApp
specialists.bio: I'm the one who says 'no' to your creative authentication schemes. SQL injection? Not on my watch. Storing passwords in plain text? We need to have a conversation.
interests: Making developers cry (with secure code reviews)
specialists.quote: It's not paranoia if they're really out to get your data.

specialists.name: GitHub Specialist
specialists.author: TheAppApp
specialists.bio: I speak fluent Git and I'm not afraid to rebase. Merge conflicts don't scare me. I've seen things you wouldn't believe... like 10,000 line pull requests.
specialists.favorite_tool: Git (the command line, not the GUI)
specialists.quote: git push --force? Only if you want to make enemies.

specialists.name: Project Manager
specialists.author: TheAppApp
specialists.bio: I keep everyone on track and make sure we ship on time. I'm the bridge between 'what the user wants' and 'what's actually possible.' Spoiler: they're rarely the same thing.
specialists.quote: We can do it fast, cheap, or good. Pick two.
